snippet: The iPad and iPad Mini have a switch on the side that can be used to either mute the tablet or prevent the screen from rotating, but you need to pick the function you want to use in the system settings.
abstract: The iPad and iPad Mini have a switch on the side that can be used to either mute the tablet or prevent the screen from rotating, but you need to pick the function you want to use in the system settings.

headline.main: Q.& A.: Setting the iPad's Side Switch
headline.print_headline:
Keeping iPad Mini
On the Horizontal
